column3: Why...? This does not make things clearer imho.\n
If this makes no sense to you feel free to just NACK or close this. I had the opposite impression as you and that's why this became a pull...\n

NACK. Please don't submit pulls that fiddle around with reformatting one or two statements, try to submit pulls that solve issues. I know it is not meant that way, but I've said this before, it feels like a denial-of-service attack on our reviewing bandwidth.\n
